QuestData.Title: Might of the Firelord
QuestData.Description: I've been charged with leading our military operations against the enemy. A humbling task when you consider there are demigods walking among us.$B$BI'm going to have you carry out a series of hit-and-run attacks behind enemy lines. It will be important that you keep the enemy off guard and weaken their numbers ahead of our main force's attack.$B$BYour first target will be the Ascendant's Rise, where the most highly trained Twilight's Hammer devotees have achieved a partial elemental state.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 4 Flame Ascendants and 5 Twilight Subjugators at the Ascendant's Rise in Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: You did well, $n. I've a new target for you.
